channel.title: Uke Along Artist » Parry Gripp & Boonebum

item.title: Parry Gripp & BooneBum - Raining Tacos
item.description:
It’s Raining Tacos by Parry Gripp & BooneBum. For educational use. This playalong is designed for high drum, low drum, clapping, and shaker. That said, it could easily be adapted for bucket drum, body drum, drum line, drumset, etc. Original Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=npjF032TDDQ
Boomwhacker Version - https://youtu.be/y6xfNi5yiZA Ukulele / Guitar Version - https://youtu.be/kgFyUphEW_0
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Parry Gripp & BooneBum - Raining Tacos
item.description:
It’s Raining Tacos by Parry Gripp & BooneBum. For educational use. The audio has been digitally lowered by 3 semitones to put it in the key of C so boomwhackers can play along. Original Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=npjF032TDDQ
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Parry Gripp & BooneBum - Raining Tacos - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Transposed to the ukulele friendly Key of C. Another appearance of Pachelbel's Canon.
As performed by Parry Gripp.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
